mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT c1.*,ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM jet_board_review ORDER BY jet_board_review_no DESC) c1 ) c2 WHERE c2.rnum >= (#{page_num}-1)*10+1 AND c2.rnum <= #{page_num}*10
SELECT * FROM jet_board_review WHERE jet_board_review_title LIKE '%' || #{serch_word} || '%' ORDER BY jet_board_review_no DESC
SELECT * FROM jet_board_review WHERE jet_board_review_content LIKE '%' || #{serch_word} || '%' ORDER BY jet_board_review_no DESC
SELECT r.* FROM jet_member m, jet_board_review r WHERE m.jet_member_no = r.jet_member_no AND m.jet_member_nick LIKE '%' || #{serch_word} || '%' ORDER BY jet_board_review_no DESC
